Key Match Events: The Spurs scored only 12 points in the second quarter, which was a significant factor in their loss.
San Antonio was dominated on the boards, losing the rebounding battle by double digits.
Post-Match Reflections: The Spurs fell to.500 on the season after the loss.
The team will need to address issues like rebounding and ball movement moving forward.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the last of 2024 for the Spurs before facing the LA Clippers.
